posts.post_content:
*WITHDRAWN*

Looking to buy two T206 Cobbs, A Green Portrait AND a Bat-off version.

My Budget is $6,000 for both cards.

Looking for grades 2.5 and below.

SGC New Label only.

Piedmont or Sweet Caporal only.

Desire Nice-for-Grade examples.

Please reply to my email:

Steve
